original_text: having been buried with him in baptism, in which you were also raised with him through your faith in the working of God, who raised him from the dead.
korean_text: 너희가 세례로 그리스도와 함께 장사되고 또 죽은 자들 가운데서 그를 일으키신 하나님의 역사를 믿음으로 말미암아 그 안에서 함께 일으키심을 받았느니라

sentences.original_text: having been buried with him in baptism
in which you were also raised with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에서 너희 또한 그와 함께 일으킴을 받았고

sentences.original_text: through your faith in the working of God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 역사하심을 믿는 너희 믿음으로 말미암아

sentences.original_text: who raised him from the dead
